QuestData.Title: Bite of the Sashj'tar
QuestData.Description: If I had been by Throndyr's side when he fought the naga, he might still be alive.$B$BThese serpents will regret the day that they decided to slither from their watery hole!$B$BKilling them is not enough. No! I will honor Throndyr with a necklace of naga fangs!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Sashj'tar Fangs from Sashj'tar naga in Azuregale Bay.
QuestData.RewardText: I will wear this in honor of Throndyr!
